Line: Can you tell me what this says?
Let me see...
Are you... sure you can't read this?
Yes? I'm not familiar with your language.
Correct me if I'm wrong but I'm almost certain this is human script.
Huh?
Wait a minute...
Huh!
The handwriting is so rushed that I couldn't even tell the difference...
What does it say?
It says...
"It's the middle of the night. I can't stop thinking about the words of the men around the fire."
"They said tomorrow."
"Was it really them? For the goddess's sake, even my brother was there! Could he..?"
"The words keep spinning in my head. They said tomorrow."
Is this some sort of horror fiction? Did the priests carry that kind of writings here?
Keep reading.
Uh... sure.
"What can I do? No one is going to believe me, and even if I tell -"
This doesn't look like a word I know. Maybe it's a name? Asawo? Asano?
Asana.
You know this person?
Yes. She was one of the priestesses here.
Then that means...
That means this was someone's diary. And we should stop reading it.
But it could hold information that -
Information that should've remained private. And I'm taking this back.
Hey! Wait!
You lost the faded page.
Give it back! What if it -
We, worshippers of the goddess, respect the secret of the dead.
And I hope you do as well. Or else.
Fine. I'm sorry for prying.
Apology accepted.
